sections.text: The boards are hereby authorized and empowered to do any and all things necessary and convenient to carry out the purposes and intent of sections 85-403 to 85-411.SourceLaws 1955, c. 352, ยง 9, p. 1078.

85-411.Campus buildings and facilities; board; powers.

The boards are hereby authorized and empowered to do any and all things necessary and convenient to carry out the purposes and intent of sections 85-403 to 85-411.

SourceLaws 1955, c. 352, ยง 9, p. 1078.
